workflowSteps.name: get_task_context
workflowSteps.description: Retrieve task context and existing analysis
workflowSteps.approach: Get comprehensive task context including codebase analysis

stepByStep: Execute TaskOperations.get to retrieve task context
Access existing codebase analysis and findings
Review business and technical requirements
Identify quality baselines and constraints

workflowSteps.name: analyze_codebase_foundation
workflowSteps.description: Use existing codebase analysis as research foundation
workflowSteps.approach: Extract patterns and identify research needs from codebase analysis

stepByStep: Extract current architecture patterns from analysis
Identify technical debt requiring research
Review tech stack for compatibility needs
Document integration constraints and quality standards

qualityChecklist: Technical debt and quality issues identified

workflowSteps.name: identify_research_questions
workflowSteps.approach: Systematic question extraction with priority classification

stepByStep: Identify technical unknowns requiring investigation
Extract implementation options needing comparison
Document integration challenges requiring research
Classify questions by priority: Critical, Important, Nice-to-have
Prioritize based on blocking impact on implementation

workflowSteps.name: conduct_research
workflowSteps.description: Research critical questions and gather evidence
workflowSteps.approach: Systematic research execution with evidence collection

stepByStep: Research critical blocking questions first
Gather evidence from authoritative sources
Test and validate technical approaches
Document findings with supporting evidence
Synthesize results into actionable recommendations

workflowSteps.name: create_research_report
workflowSteps.description: Generate comprehensive research report with findings
workflowSteps.approach: Structured report generation with actionable insights

stepByStep: Organize findings by research question priority
Document evidence and sources for each finding
Provide clear recommendations for implementation
Include risk assessment and mitigation strategies
Prepare comprehensive handoff for architect role

qualityChecklist: Findings organized by priority and impact

workflowSteps.name: role_transition
workflowSteps.description: Transition to architect role with research findings
workflowSteps.approach: Execute transition to architect with comprehensive research handoff

stepByStep: Execute get_role_transitions with fromRoleName: 'researcher'
Extract transitionId for researcher to architect transition
Execute execute_transition with research findings in handoff
Verify transition success and delegation confirmation

qualityChecklist: Correct transitionId obtained for architect transition
Transition success verified and delegation confirmed
